The grunge jacket is definitely cute, but don’t expect it to fit like it does on the model in the photos, no matter how large of a size you get. I ended up keeping it because I really needed more jackets, and it’s not completely horrible—it still looks nice enough. It’s actually thicker than I expected, but still feels like a light jacket overall. If you’re looking for a casual, slightly oversized look, this might work, but just be prepared for a different fit than what’s advertised.

The hoodie is comfy and cute. I wanted it oversized but it is not as big as typical 2x size would be. So it runs a bit smaller but has not been a problem. It is also not as thick as a typical hoodie but for hot humid Florida this is just right. Thumbs up.
This zip up was okay. The fabric and quality is not the best and there are no pockets.

This is a great hoodie, the quality is great and very soft. It’s also pretty stretchy, which I love. The graphic looks just like the picture, although my graphic came in the wrong color. It was brown. Either way, it’s an amazing hoodie and I am keeping it.

Its a very soft jacket, and overall very cute. It is definitely not as shown in the picture though. For one, the XL fits like a normal large or medium, its a very thin jacket, the pattern is slightly different, and it attracts lint and hair. It also has a keyring on the zipper, which is non removable. Along with that, the design on the front will probably fry off in the dryer. Overall it does feel kind of cheap, and there are probably better options, but its not too bad and if you want it to fit more like the picturr get the 2XL!

I normally wear a medium, but I really wanted this to be baggy so I ordered an extra large and it just fits. I feel like me and you want something a little bigger and baggier get at least two sizes up other than that it’s really good and soft

The sweatshirt came as expected, though im a size small and i ordered a large for a baggy-ish effect and it fits like a medium so i recommend going a size up. zipper does get a little stuck and the material is super thin, almost like a thicker version of craft store felt but soft, it is good for my texture issues. about what i expected though !

评论概述: Design was junked up, good hoodie tho

Im sending this back hopefully to get a new one with a decent print job, hopefully this was just a one time unlucky deal. on the upside the material is very soft and feels nice, it isn't too thin or low quality either. Very good hoodie, very unfortunate print.

This is my first time ordering clothes off of amazon, it was an okay first purchase. I was saddened when I saw that there were no pockets. The inside is decently warm but the material sticks to other “fuzzy” things. Compared to some of my sweaters off of shein this one has much better quality.

评论概述: good jacket, came with holes tho :/

Other than the holes, the jacket fits perfect and the design is decent.

评论概述: Cheap zipper makes this unpleasant to wear but I needed it for an emergency.
评论详情: I needed a shirt that closed in the front to wear going home after surgery. Since I only had a few days and no chance to shop elsewhere for something in my size, I ordered this. It is a bit smaller than I expected and has what may be the cheapest zipper I have ever used. It kept catching and jamming and I was actually afraid it would hurt my skin. (Fortunately, it did not.) Since I did wear this, I won't return it, but I plan to donate it somewhere and will never buy this brand again.
